questions.question_text: Which two user types are available to a voice engineer adding a user in Cisco Unity Connection? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
A. User with mailbox
D. User without mailbox

choices.E: Local admin user with mailbox AD
It always retransmit the rekey message.
choices.B: It only retransmit the rekey message when it does not receive the rekey acknowledgment from at least one group member.
choices.D: It only retransmit the rekey message when DPD to the group members fails.
choices.A: It never retransmit the rekey messages.
choices.C: It only retransmit the rekey message when it does not receive the rekey acknowledgment from all group member.

questions.question_text: With GETVPN, if a key server is configured to use multicast as the rekey transport mechanism, then under which of these conditions will the key server retransmit the rekey messages?

choices.F: Cisco Unity Connection supports integrations with OpenLDAP.
choices.C: There is no limit to the amount of LDAP filters that can be created.
choices.D: SSL certificates from LDAP must be uploaded to Cisco Unity Connection.
choices.A: PINs and passwords are replicated from the LDAP database to Cisco Unity Connection database.
choices.B: LDAP authentication must be configured and enabled.
choices.E: LDAP synchronization must be configured and enabled.

questions.question_text: An engineer is syncing Cisco Unity Connection with LDAP. Which three things should the engineer consider during this process? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
I think LDAP Authentication is optional, thus SSL encryption is not necessary.
Source: https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/connection/10x/administration/guide/10xcucsagx/10xcucsag120.html
I think C is correct as you can create as many filters as you want, but you can only enable one.
Also, for CUC 10x, OpenLDAP synchronization is supported. Source:
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/connection/10x/requirements/10xcucsysreqs.html#pgfId-593033
I think the three "things to consider" are C,E, F

questions.question_text: Which two protocols does Jabber use to achieve Presence status? (Choose two.)
Which four characteristics are associated with video? (Choose four.)

discussion.content: Answer E "Drop-sensitive" is a 5th characteristic of video, according to Cisco's Implementing Cisco Collaboration Devices curriculum.
